title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Management of watersheds for soil/water/vegetation conservation; preparation of land drainage schemes: types and elementary design of facilities for surface drainage/ subsurface drainage/special drainage; types and elementary design of water conservation and water harvesting structures for different types of catchments; estimation of outflows from watershed outlet structures; flood routing through channels and reservoirs; flood control through single purpose and multipurpose reservoir operation; types and basic design of flood forecasting and protection systems; flood magnitude quantification and flood damage case studies; types and preliminary analysis of droughts; strategies for drought-proofing.
